welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rapid City, where the charm of the Black Hills meets the vibrant culture of the American West. Get ready to explore our historic downtown, renowned national monuments, and breathtaking outdoor adventures â€“ we're thrilled to have you here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rapid City Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Rapid City Regional Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Rapid City Regional Airport serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
